channel.title: 2006Reborn - Now Recruiting
channel.description:
Hello everyone, i just wanted to introduce this topic, with a few things. First of all, yes this is a 2006 remake. And no, im not going to quit after a week of developing, and then decide to suspend the project months on months, then take all of the donations, run and threaten my dev's. I've been trying to do this forever, and i've decided that it's been enough. There's too many people who arent honestly devoted, and come into this thinking that they can make a RSPS and just fail. Now, you can think what you want to think, but that's not me. I'm making an attempt here to get a team togeather and bring back what everybody wants. Don't even bother flaming this thread, because what any of you say will not really change my decision to start a RSPS. Yes, i am not a 10 / 10 Java coder, that's why im looking for a team.
My Skype - Trippledean My Steam - DG.麦金塔
[size=10pt][b]2006Reborn Programmer Template[/b][/size] [code]) How long have you been programming? 2) What languages are you GOOD at? 3) Are you capable of programming for private servers? [b]If yes to 3:[/b] Can you add custom items to a client? Can you design interfaces from supplied images? Can you redesign the gameframe from supplied images? Can you implement new networking methods? Can you design unique features from scratch? 4) Have you done any programming away from RSPS, if so, what? 5) Are you capable of designing standalone applications for Embattled? 6) Do you know SQL? 7) Direct examples of your works.[/code]
[size=10pt][b]2006Reborn GFX Application[/b][/size] [code]1) Can you design images from scratch? 2) Can you design and edit video? 3) Can you design web pages, if so, what languages do you know? 4) Can you create and implement custom RSPS animations? 5) Can you create and implement custom RSPS models? 6) Can you create high-quality models (Not for RSPS)? 7) Can you create high-quality animations (Not for RSPS)? 8) What software do you use? (Maya, Photoshop, Premiere, etc) 9) Can you edit the map of an RSPS through map editing software? 10) Direct examples to your works.[/code]
I will be adding to this topic as time goes on, this is just temporary.

item.title: 2006Reborn - Now Recruiting
item.dc:creator: @kokoface kokoface
item.description:
@kokoface wrote:

Hello everyone, i just wanted to introduce this topic, with a few things. First of all, yes this is a 2006 remake. And no, im not going to quit after a week of developing, and then decide to suspend the project months on months, then take all of the donations, run and threaten my dev’s. I’ve been trying to do this forever, and i’ve decided that it’s been enough. There’s too many people who arent honestly devoted, and come into this thinking that they can make a RSPS and just fail. Now, you can think what you want to think, but that’s not me. I’m making an attempt here to get a team togeather and bring back what everybody wants. Don’t even bother flaming this thread, because what any of you say will not really change my decision to start a RSPS. Yes, i am not a 10 / 10 Java coder, that’s why im looking for a team.

My Skype - Trippledean
My Steam - DG.麦金塔

[size=10pt]2006Reborn Programmer Template[/size]

) How long have you been programming? 2) What languages are you GOOD at? 3) Are you capable of programming for private servers? [b]If yes to 3:[/b] Can you add custom items to a client? Can you design interfaces from supplied images? Can you redesign the gameframe from supplied images? Can you implement new networking methods? Can you design unique features from scratch? 4) Have you done any programming away from RSPS, if so, what? 5) Are you capable of designing standalone applications for Embattled? 6) Do you know SQL? 7) Direct examples of your works.

[size=10pt]2006Reborn GFX Application[/size]

1) Can you design images from scratch? 2) Can you design and edit video? 3) Can you design web pages, if so, what languages do you know? 4) Can you create and implement custom RSPS animations? 5) Can you create and implement custom RSPS models? 6) Can you create high-quality models (Not for RSPS)? 7) Can you create high-quality animations (Not for RSPS)? 8) What software do you use? (Maya, Photoshop, Premiere, etc) 9) Can you edit the map of an RSPS through map editing software? 10) Direct examples to your works.

I will be adding to this topic as time goes on, this is just temporary.
